name: MoMo
greetingText: Sorry, I couldn't be with you on this special day.
text1: 20 years ago, this kiddo cried for the first time and made it as her hobby
textInChatBox: Happy birthday divikdi, kuch khaya piya karo.. sehat p dhyan rkho...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I hope you'll like it, if you don't, Sejal Shreya is to blame.
